name: language_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool real_time_news_data.
Tool description: Exceptionally Fast and Simple API to get top news globally or per topic and search for news by query and geographic area in real-time.
API description: Fetches the list of valid languages for the given country using the Real Time News Data API.

country.description: Country code of the country to get languages for. See [all available country codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2).
